boat.full_description:
She's been trailed to participate in events on the East Coast, Western Highlands and Milford Haven as well as cruising the tidal Thames in London under oar and sail. She has taken part in the annual Great River Race.

Construction is mahogany and larch on oak, with gunwales, thwarts etc. in solid teak.
boat.name: Vancouver
boat.short_description: 'Vancouver' was built 1943 for the Royal Navy as a ship’s boat. She's beem lovingly restored and maintained over many years.
